title: Nicola: 'I feel at home in Genoa'
description: Coach Davide Nicola has revealed that he âfeels at homeâ in Genoa and has claimed he âfirmly believesâ the Rossoblu will stay up this campaign.
content:
Coach Davide Nicola has revealed that he “feels at home” in Genoa and has claimed he “firmly believes” the Rossoblu will stay up this campaign.
Nicola was appointed the new Genoa coach in December, when President Enrico Preziosi decided to sack Thiago Motta,… [+1228 chars]
